participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, Emily enjoys socializing and sharing laughs with her friends. She has a playful sense of humor and loves to discuss her interests.
participant_1.background: My favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. I'm a blonde girl with really short hair. I'm rather skinny as I like to stay in shape. My favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. I have two sweet dogs that I adore.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is laid-back and humorous, often making light of situations. He enjoys fitness and has a passion for cooking, which he often connects with his love for food.
participant_2.background: Two dogs live with me. I've short hair. I like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. I go to the gym regularly. I'm a cook and I've always had a hobby of working on trucks.
